data.title: Carly Rose Sonenclar: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Carly Rose Sonenclar? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Carly Rose Sonenclar's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Carly Rose Sonenclar News

Khalid and Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei Release New Song LOVE LIES

According to Billboard, the new track LOVE LIES has been released today from Khalid and Fifth Harmony's Normani Kordei. Read more about it from Billboard here!

The Broadway Boys to Host 10th Annual BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS Benefit

The Broadway Boys will once again host Broadway's favorite holiday party and concert with the 10th Annual BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS: A Benefit for Toys for Tots, Monday, December 11th at 6:30pm.

Photo Coverage: Inside the 14th Annual Woman's Day Red Dress Awards

Woman's Day just celebrated the 14th annual Red Dress Awards, honoring those who have made significant contributions in the fight against heart disease, the number one killer of women today.

VIDEO: Music Video for Fifth Harmony's 'All In My Head' ft. Fetty Wap

Below, check out the new music video for Fifth Harmony's 'All In My Head (Flex)' ft. Fetty Wap off their new album '727.' Don't miss Fifth Harmony this Summer on The 7/27 Tour!

VIDEO: Fifth Harmony's New Song 'That's My Girl' featured in Rio Olympics Spot

'That's My Girl' will be the first track off of Fifth Harmony's upcoming sophomore album. Below, you can get a first listen to the tune, courtesy of an all-new commercial for this summer's Olympics in Rio!

Check Out The Complete Video Playlist For The Hit Concert Series IF IT ONLY EVEN RUNS A MINUTE

How many of these great songs do you know from underappreciated musicals?

Fifth Harmony Announces Upcoming Album '7/27'

According to Ohnotheydidnt.com, the girls of Fifth Harmony announced the title of their upcoming album on Instagram.

Photo Coverage: On the Carpet at GIGI's Opening Night!

Gigi, Alan Jay Lerner and Frederick Loewe's beloved Oscar and Tony Award-winning musical comedy, celebrated its opening Wednesday night, April 8, at the Neil Simon Theatre (250 West 52nd Street).Gigi starsVanessa Hudgens, who makes her Broadway debut in the title role, Tony Award-winner Victoria Clark(The Light in the Piazza, Sister Act, Rodgers + Hammerstein's Cinderella) as Mamita, Corey Cott(Newsies) as Gaston Lachaille, three-time Tony Award-nominee Dee Hoty (The Will RogersFollies, The Best Little Whorehouse Goes Public, Footloose) as Aunt Alicia, two-time Tony Award-nomineeHoward McGillin (The Mystery of Edwin Drood, Anything Goes) as Honore Lachaille andSteffanie Leigh (Mary Poppins) as Liane d'Exelmans.

The Broadway Boys Host 9th Annual BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS Tonight

The Broadway Boys will once again host Broadway¹s favorite holiday party and concert with the 9th Annual BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS: A Benefit for Toys for Tots, tonight, December 15th at 7:30pm (Doors 6:30).

BWW Previews: BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS Hosted by The Broadway Boys on 12/15

The Broadway Boys will host the 9th Annual 'BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS' a benefit for Toys for Tots. The performance will be held on 12/15 at 42West at 7:30 pm. This star-studded event will feature many special guests.

The Broadway Boys to Host 9th Annual BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS, 12/15

The Broadway Boys will once again host Broadway¹s favorite holiday party and concert with the 9th Annual BROADWAY SINGS FOR TOYS: A Benefit for Toys for Tots, Monday Dec 15th at 7:30pm (Doors 6:30). The annual concert is a cocktail party/concert/toy drive that gathers Broadways hottest talent for a dynamic and inspirational concert sure to brighten your spirits!

STAGE TUBE: Watch Highlights from Tokyo Premiere of Wildhorn's WONDERLAND

Highlight footage of the Tokyo premiere of Frank Wildhorn's WONDERLAND has just been released. Check it out below!

Emerson Theatre Collaborative Presents HOUR FARTHER This Weekend

Emerson Theatre Collaborative (ETC), in association with Black Stars of the Great White Way - a Chapman Roberts and Richard Allen Center for Art & Culture, announces its production of the play, Hour Farther written by David Horace Greer, directed by Camilla Ross, and starring renowned stage and screen actor and singer, Kirk Taylor. Most recently, Mr. Taylor had the honor of working alongside the late Robin Williams and Mila Kunis in the film, The Angriest Man In Brooklyn directed by Phillip Alden Robinson.

Emerson Theatre Collaborative to Present HOUR FARTHER, 10/3-4

Emerson Theatre Collaborative (ETC), in association with Black Stars of the Great White Way - a Chapman Roberts and Richard Allen Center for Art & Culture, announces its production of the play, Hour Farther written by David Horace Greer, directed by Camilla Ross, and starring renowned stage and screen actor and singer, Kirk Taylor. Most recently, Mr. Taylor had the honor of working alongside the late Robin Williams and Mila Kunis in the film, The Angriest Man In Brooklyn directed by Phillip Alden Robinson.

Carly Rose Sonenclar to Debut New Music LIVE on Stageit.com, 8/3

On Sunday, August 3rd at 6 PM ET Carly Rose Sonenclar will perform live online on Stageit.com. The show will mark Carly's first Stageit performance with her full band and will showcase her performing new original songs. Tickets for the concert can be purchased at http://bit.ly/1rlTyR3. A portion of the proceeds from the show will be donated to The Starlight Children's Foundation of NY/NJ and CT.

VIDEO: First Look - Music Video for Fifth Harmony's New Single 'Boss'

Fifth Harmony has shared the official video for their new single 'Bo$$.' Check it out below!

Top Stories You Missed on BWW This Weekend - 12/14-12/15/2013

Hottest Articles on BroadwayWorld.com from this weekend Sunday, December 15, 2013 - Sunday, December 15, 2013.

'Celebrate The Season' with X Factor's Carly Rose Sonenclar, LIVE Online Tonight

'Tis the season to celebrate and give back to those in need- and 'X Factor' favorite Carly Rose Sonenclar (Broadway's Wonderland) is doing both with a very special holiday concert tonight, December 15th at 6pm EST. 'Celebrate the Season with Carly' will stream live worldwide on StageIt.com, allowing her fans across the globe to join the 14-year-old singing sensation for an intimate, stripped-down acoustic set-- while supporting an incredibly important cause.

Loston Harris Trio Performs at Bryant Park Tree Lighting Tonight

The Loston Harris Trio will be featured at this year's Bryant Park Tree Lighting Show, which will present an array of personalities, musicians, and excitement.
